member.name: M:PetAPI.Controllers.PetController.GetPets
member.summary: This is endpoint takes no arguments and returns the list of pets

member.name: M:PetAPI.Controllers.PetController.GetPet(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the pet object of a specific ID
member.param: The id of the pet, which must be a valid integer

member.name: M:PetAPI.Controllers.PetController.AddPet(PetAPI.Pet)
member.summary: Adds a pet object to the list of pets
member.param: The pet object to be added
member.returns: Ok response in the form of pet image

member.name: M:PetAPI.Controllers.PetController.UpdatePet(PetAPI.Pet)
member.param: The pet object to be updated

member.name: M:PetAPI.Controllers.PetController.DeletePet(System.Int32)
member.summary: Removes a pet of specific Id from list
member.param: The Id of the pet to be deleteed
member.returns: The list of pets after deletion
